      • createUrl

        public java.lang.String createUrl(java.lang.String details)
        Creates an URL String with an protocol, a domainName and some given details
        Parameters:
        details - the extra details
        Returns:
        the created URL String in url-encoded format

      • createUrlWithParams

        public java.lang.String createUrlWithParams(java.lang.String urlString,
                                            ParamsMap paramsMap)
        Appends some params to a given URL String NOTE: this non-static version is used in SDK Mockito tests (see MambuAPIServiceTest). Mockito cannot use static methods
        Parameters:
        urlString - the already created URL String
        paramsMap - the params which must be added
        Returns:
        the complete URL

      • makeUrlWithParams

        public static java.lang.String makeUrlWithParams(java.lang.String urlString,
                                                 ParamsMap paramsMap)
        Static helper to Append URL params to a given URL String
        Parameters:
        urlString - the already created URL String
        paramsMap - the params which must be added
        Returns:
        the complete URL

      • addJsonPaginationParams

        public java.lang.String addJsonPaginationParams(java.lang.String urlString,
                                                RequestExecutor.Method method,
                                                RequestExecutor.ContentType contentTypeFormat,
                                                ParamsMap params)
        Add pagination params to a given URL String for POST with application/json content type. Pagination parameters shall be be added to the URL string. See MBU-8975. Only "offset" and "limit" parameters are added. For example, in API call POST {JSONFilterConstraints} /api/loans/search?offset=0&limit=5
        Parameters:
        urlString - original URL string
        method - method
        contentTypeFormat - content type format
        params - input parameters. If pagination parameters are added to the URL string then they are removed from the original params map
        Returns:
        URL string with pagination parameters added for POST with application/json content type

      • addDetailsParam

        public java.lang.String addDetailsParam(java.lang.String urlString,
                                        RequestExecutor.Method method,
                                        RequestExecutor.ContentType contentTypeFormat,
                                        ParamsMap params)
        Appends the details level query param to a given URL in case exist
        Parameters:
        urlString - the String URL where the details level will be appended
        method - the HTTP method of the request
        contentTypeFormat - the content type of the request
        params - the params of the request
        Returns:
        the appended URL

      • userAgentHeaderValue

        public java.lang.String userAgentHeaderValue()
        Gets the user agent header value as set once with the factory initialization
        Returns:
        String value representing the user agent header value
